name: ios-photo-repair
description: An IOS Photo Direction Repair Tool

scripts.dev: rm -rf .cache && rm -rf build && parcel src/index.html -d build
scripts.build: rm -rf .cache && rm -rf dist && parcel build src/lib/fixer.js
scripts.test: rm -rf .cache && rm -rf build && parcel test/index.html -d build

author: tower1229@foxmail.com
